text: ‘‘He jinna ra manisaharuko samuha. Ke timiharunira timiharumadhyebatai paigambaraharu a'eka thi'enan, jasale mera ayataharu (niyamaharu) timila'i padhera suna'umdathe ra timila'i ajako dinako khabara didainathe?’’ Tiniharule vinti garnechan ki, ‘‘ho a'umdathe hami aphna papa aphai svikardachaum.’’ Yiniharula'i sansarika jivanale bhramama parirakheko cha ra tyasa samayama tiniharu syavamle aphno virud'dha aphai saksi hunechana ki, tiniharu kaphira thi'e.’’
